question: You land your airplane at the City Documentation Terminal. The control tower radios in and says, 'Flight DP-200, request received, understood, and successfully processed. You're clear to unload.' What HTTP status code did the control tower just send your system?

You fly to the BuildZone, where a new structure request has been submitted. You press the 'Deploy Tower' button and see a construction drone zip out and place the first block. Moments later, you receive a glowing message: 'Deployment successful! Your new tower has been created and is now accessible at /structures/tower-17.' What HTTP response status best represents this successful creation?

You attempt to send a resource drop to a nearby village, but you accidentally leave the coordinates field blank. The system flashes a red warning: 'Invalid input! We can’t process this request – something’s missing or malformed.' Which HTTP status code should your server return in this situation?

You follow your radar to what was supposed to be the 'Old Dev Temple.' When you arrive, there’s only a barren field. Your on-board AI says: 'Hmm... there’s nothing here. The location you’re looking for doesn’t exist.' What HTTP status code reflects this mystery?

You attempt to launch the City Core Diagnostics, but instead of a report, smoke starts rising from your dashboard. The system apologetically blinks: 'Something went wrong on our end. Try again later... if the server stops panicking.' Which HTTP status code would best describe this situation?
